short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crushbank extension that embeds the site into a portable extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CrushBank customers can now use a Chrome extension to access our softwareâ€™s automated features. Click on the tab, to enter a ticket number and return the top-ranked search-results from your ticket history, documentation, Teams channels, and configs to your technicians.
